io.springlets.web.mvc.util

Interface MethodLinkBuilder<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the class of the Controller to create links to
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleMethodLinkBuilder

    public interface MethodLinkBuilder<T>
    Build links to controller methods. Provides a simple DSL to set the method parameters as well as the path variables needed to build the URI to the controller method.
    Author:
    Cèsar Ordiñana at http://www.disid.com[DISID Corporation S.L.]

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MethodLinkBuilder<T> arg(int index, Object parameter)
      Provides parameters for the method.
      String toPath()
      Returns the Path of the URI String to the method with the current builder configuration.
      org.springframework.web.util.UriComponents toUri()
      Creates a UriComponents instance with the current builder configuration.
      String toUriString()
      Returns the full URI String to the method with the current builder configuration.
      MethodLinkBuilder<T> with(String variable, Object value)
      Adds a path variable to build the method URI.

    • Method Detail

      • arg

        MethodLinkBuilder<T> arg(int index,
                         Object parameter)
        Provides parameters for the method. It will add the given parameters to any previously added ones.
        Parameters:
        parameters - of the method
        Returns:
        the builder with the given method parameters

      • with

        MethodLinkBuilder<T> with(String variable,
                          Object value)
        Adds a path variable to build the method URI. The variable name must be the same as the one included between {} clauses in the RequestMapping of the method.
        Parameters:
        variable - name of the path variable
        value - value to replace with
        Returns:
        the builder with the given path variable

      • toUri

        org.springframework.web.util.UriComponents toUri()
        Creates a UriComponents instance with the current builder configuration.
        Returns:
        the uri to the method with the current configuration

      • toUriString

        String toUriString()
        Returns the full URI String to the method with the current builder configuration.
        Returns:
        the full URI String

      • toPath

        String toPath()
        Returns the Path of the URI String to the method with the current builder configuration.
        Returns:
        the URI path
